mapper.sql: select detailed_id, detailed_uuid,plan_uuid,party_org_id, cycle, party_member_id, venue, activity_content, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, activity_plan_start_time, activity_plan_end_time, actual_start_time, actual_end_time, recorder, mentors, presenter, speaker, allow_comment, activity_vote_id, activity_exam_id, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from dj_activity_detailed

select detailed.detailed_id, detailed.detailed_uuid,detailed.plan_uuid,detailed.party_org_id, detailed.cycle, detailed.party_member_id, detailed.venue, detailed.activity_content, detailed.plan_start_time, detailed.plan_end_time, detailed.activity_plan_start_time, detailed.activity_plan_end_time, detailed.actual_start_time, detailed.actual_end_time, detailed.recorder, detailed.mentors, detailed.presenter, detailed.speaker, detailed.allow_comment, detailed.activity_vote_id, detailed.activity_exam_id, detailed.status, detailed.del_flag, detailed.create_by, detailed.create_time,detailed.update_by, detailed.update_time from dj_activity_detailed detailed
mapper.select:
left join dj_activity_arrange arrange on arrange.plan_uuid = detailed.plan_uuid and arrange.party_org_id = detailed.party_org_id left join dj_activity_plan plan on arrange.plan_uuid = plan.plan_uuid
arrange.status ='2'
and plan.activity_theme like concat('%', #{activityTheme}, '%')
and detailed.party_org_id = #{partyOrgId}
and detailed.status in ('5')
and detailed.status in ('2','3','4','6')
${dataScope}
mapper.insert:
insert into dj_activity_detailed
detailed_id, detailed_uuid, plan_uuid, party_org_id, cycle, party_member_id, venue, activity_content, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, activity_plan_start_time, activity_plan_end_time, actual_start_time, actual_end_time, recorder, mentors, presenter, speaker, allow_comment, activity_vote_id, activity_exam_id, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{detailedId}, #{detailedUuid}, #{planUuid}, #{partyOrgId}, #{cycle}, #{partyMemberId}, #{venue}, #{activityContent}, #{planStartTime}, #{planEndTime}, #{activityPlanStartTime}, #{activityPlanEndTime}, #{actualStartTime}, #{actualEndTime}, #{recorder}, #{mentors}, #{presenter}, #{speaker}, #{allowComment}, #{activityVoteId}, #{activityExamId}, #{status}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from dj_activity_detailed where detailed_id in
#{detailedId}
